methods.name: public Builder setInstantTetherEnabled(boolean instantTetherEnabled)
methods.comment:
* Sets the state of Instant Tether in settings
         *
         * @return Returns the Builder object.

methods.name: public Builder setInstantTetherSettingsPendingIntent(@NonNull PendingIntent pendingIntent)
methods.comment:
* Sets the {@link PendingIntent} that will open the Instant Tether settings page.
         * The pending intent must be set as {@link PendingIntent#FLAG_IMMUTABLE}.
         *
         * @return Returns the Builder object.

methods.name: public Builder setExtras(@NonNull Bundle extras)
methods.comment:
* Sets the extras bundle
         *
         * @return Returns the Builder object.

methods.name: public SharedConnectivitySettingsState build()
methods.comment:
* Builds the {@link SharedConnectivitySettingsState} object.
         *
         * @return Returns the built {@link SharedConnectivitySettingsState} object.
